channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jamie Dimon predicts AI will shorten the workweek: ‘My guess is the developed world be working three-and-a-half days a week’
item.description: He thinks it’ll eliminate jobs, but we can steer our way out of disaster.

item.title: Peloton Just Announced Another Massive Recall After Reports of Injuries
item.description: It’s the home fitness company’s second large-scale recall for this part.

item.title: He’s drawn Donald Trump hundreds of times. Now he’s drawing Zohran Mamdani
item.description: Artist Edel Rodriguez is famous for his satirical images of Donald Trump. Since 2016, he’s produced dozens of images of the president in an ultra-simp...

item.title: Inside Netflix’s big deal with AB InBev
item.description: The term brand entertainment is tough to define. For many people, it’s an oxymoron and these two words should never be in the same room as one another...

item.title: Private Clubs Keep Popping Up—and Founders Are Using Them to Launch Their Companies
AI Educator: This Is The Number 1 Mistake AI Users Make—and How to Fix It
item.description: Mel Robbins discussed prompt tips with AI leader Allie K. Miller on her podcast yesterday.

item.title: Trump unveils deal with Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to lower costs and expand coverage for obesity drugs
item.description: President Donald Trump unveiled a deal Thursday with drugmakers Eli Lilly and Novo Nordisk to expand coverage and reduce prices for their popular obes...

item.title: Amid Government Shutdown ‘Fog’, Employers Are Scrutinizing Private Data for Economic Clues
item.description: The absence of official economic and labor statistics amid the government shutdown leaves business leaders depending on sometimes clashing reports fro...

item.title: These 40 Airports Are About to Face Thousands of Flight Cancellations
item.description: The government is slashing air traffic at the country’s top airports.

item.title: These 3 major airlines are offering flight refunds during the government shutdown, starting tomorrow
item.description: United Airlines , American Airlines, and Delta Air Lines said they will refund tickets for customers starting on Friday, November 7, after the Federal...

item.title: Tests showing Chinese-made buses can be stopped remotely prompt Norwegian pullback
item.description: The company said tests, done in underground mines to block signals, used both new Yutong buses and three-year-old models from Dutch maker VDL.

item.title: Nancy Pelosi retires from legendary career as Obama hails ‘one of the best speakers the House of Representatives has ever had’
item.description: “I will not be seeking reelection to Congress,” Pelosi said in a video address to voters.

item.title: Why Peloton is telling thousands of customers to get off their bikes
item.description: If sweating it out on a Peloton helps you stay fit, be sure to see if you’re affected by a major new recall from the exercise bike maker. Peloton issu...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani is New York’s first millennial Mayor—experts share how the young leader’s style will differ from his boomer predecessors
item.description: Higher minimum wage for young workers, remote working and a 4-day workweek could get a spotlight thanks to New York’s first millennial Mayor

item.title: Boeing won’t face a criminal conspiracy charge over two 737 Max jetliner crashes that killed 346 people
item.description: As part of a deal to drop the charge, the American aerospace company has agreed to pay or invest an additional $1.1 billion in fines.
